ygData.subject: Re: the ring
ygData.msgSnippet: ok, upon further investigation i have determined that you can obtain it by giving the thex mallet to the SK in neriak who gives out quests. those of you who
ygData.messageBody:
ok, upon further investigation i have determined that you can obtain it
by giving the thex mallet to the SK in neriak who gives out quests.
those of you who know what the thex mallet is may cower in the corner
while i explain to the rest: the thex mallet is in 3 parts, all of which
are in the dungeon of befallen. two of those parts can be found randomly
on elf skeletons. the third is held by a special monster, commander
windstream, a lvl 35 zombie. he ONLY appears if you bring a note from
the neriak guild to lrodd. the problem for me is, i dont know the
keywords to use to get that quest, and in order to get it, i have to
complete a quest that i CANT GET because i am too high level. for the
record, i consider this Really Stupid. if anybody learns the keywords
needed to begin the thex mallet quest, do tell so that we dont have to
steal windstream from others :) once you have the 3 mallet pieces, you
have to combine them (using, i THINK, the smithing skill in a forge).
the mallet itself is useable, but has rather mediocre stats considering
what you have to do to get it. the important part is to turn it in to
the guild to obtain your handy ring of the dead! i will grab the hammer
my guild has put together as soon as the guy with it returns from
faydwer.. i'll let you know how things turn out.

Beld Demonblade
Fennin Ro
